After more than 4 months of testing, on the afternoon of
October 5, the results of a comprehensive inspection of the
tikt social network in Vietnam were
announced.  At the regular press conference in
October of the Ministry of Information and
Communications, according to the conclusion from the inspection team,
tiktok Vietnam has violations related
to e-commerce services with
harmful content and plants harmful to
children.  said that tikt's two legal entities
in Vietnam do not participate in the
management and provision of tikt services to
users in Vietnam, but are
directly managed and operated by tikt Singapore
according to the Inspection Conclusion of tiktok Singapore
storing information.  Information that violates Vietnamese law
on cdn servers in Vietnam,
specifically information that is fake, distorted,
inciting violence, inciting social evils,
information that is harmful to children, and
ineffective content censorship processes  As a result,
Singapore's Tiktok company as well as
Tit's two units in Vietnam also
coordinated very well with the inspection team
to provide full information and documents upon
receiving the inspection conclusion.
Adjusting the set of requirements for
tiktok Singapore to authorize
Vietnamese tiktok companies to directly participate in
management activities providing cross-

climate science Says the

Meanwhile, on the east coast
of Greenland, Itom is one of the
most isolated villages in the
world, accessible only by helicopter
or boat when the ice melts for one
month each year.
Global warming caused by human activities has caused the
glacier above the village to
melt to the point that those
responsible for the local drinking water reservoir
fear they will have to desalinate seawater
to meet demand.  In the coming years the
scarcity of nutrients causes a
chain reaction of less plankton
so there are less polar cod less
seals and bears which are essential sources of protein
for the village's residents are suffering.
Threatening new research from the
Green Landia expedition paints a bleak picture
of the glacier's future. Once the
water gets warmer, the Snow Algae
sanguina nival loes produces a
red-orange pigment that reduces its ability to survive.  Snow's ability to reflect
sunlight thus increases
the rate of melting. According to research,
these algae species are responsible for up to
12 ph of annual ice loss in the
Greenland ice cap, equivalent to 32 billion tons of
ice, according to scientists.  Currently specializing
in the Arctic, over the past two decades,
ice loss in Greenland has lost 4.7 billion
tons, contributing to sea level rise by
cm.

prove that the owner has
visited the temple. However, thanks to the trend
Many young Japanese people found themselves

visitors when you pray at a

but rather an attachment to
Japanese religious traditions without necessarily
having a deep understanding of the religion.

Last night, the working group of the Traffic Police Department of the Ministry of
Public Security  Coordinated with the

was released.  Detected and made records to handle

red light and was asked by the police to check.  While checking his
alcohol level while waiting on the side of the road,
this man suddenly picked up a lighter and sat
down to pull out the motorbike's fuel pipe, causing gasoline
to flow onto the road to put pressure on the
working group to
quickly control the person.  According to the results of the
alcohol concentration test, this man
violated the level of
0.68 Mgm in the working age. A working group member
made an administrative violation record
and impounded his vehicle. A member of the
